definition: to procure/to act as pimp
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
leather/skin/fur/CL:張|张[zhang1]/pico- (one trillionth)/naughty
surname Pi
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Soliciting a scarlet woman in China can be a serious crime.
sentences.chinese: 在中國大陸拉皮條，可能是重罪。

sentences.english: He became well known for pandering to any man who needed a woman.
sentences.chinese: 他以給人拉皮條而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: For many years David lived an evil life, pandering to men's sexual's desires.
sentences.chinese: 多年來大衛一直過着邪惡的生活，爲男人拉皮條。

sentences.english: And I am not pimping you out.
Kill more chinks, free thai women pimped by chinese men.
sentences.chinese: 多殺點中國佬，解放被中國男人拉皮條的泰國女人。

sentences.english: But I really and honestly feel that we're pandering.
sentences.chinese: 但我真的覺得我們像是拉皮條的。

sentences.english: He made an immoral living procuring women for tourists in the city.
sentences.chinese: 他靠爲旅客拉皮條而過着見不得人的生活。

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
to talk nonsense/to bullshit
to drown sb in a wicker basket, a form of 沉潭[chen2 tan2]
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: sb who goes whichever way the wind blows/sb with no mind of their own/easily swayed person/opportunist
foolish talk/nonsense
henpecked male
having nothing better to do
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
vain
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
both sides are willing/by mutual consent
to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: to censor an image/to pixelate
